about_the_game:
The Sailaway World Editor allows end-users to change the shape of the terrain and the depth of local waters. This enables you to improve the sailing waters and share your knowledge with other sailors.

  • Edit any part of the world in low or high detail
  • Enhance water depths
  • Improve the appearance of ports and coastlines
  • Change coastline textures
  • Upload and place 3D buildings/models

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 (El Capitan)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB of dedicated Video RAM or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required to play the game.
